detail_desc: Short dress in washed cotton denim with a collar, press-studs down the front, flap chest pockets with a press-stud and side pockets. Yoke at the shoulders and back, long sleeves with a press-stud at the cuffs, and a rounded hem.

V-neck, knee-length dress in Tencel™ lyocell with pin-tucks down the front of the neckline, gathers front and back, short sleeves with pin-tucks, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.
Flat cap in a woven wool blend. Cotton lining.
Cargo trousers in airy cotton poplin with an elasticated drawstring waist and spacious front, back and leg pockets. Legs with a tab and press stud.
Long-sleeved jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with roll-edge ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Sandals in imitation leather with adjustable foot straps. Moulded insoles and slightly higher, fluted soles.
Loose-fitting vest top in linen slub jersey with a deep neckline. Rounded and slightly longer at the back.
Cotton poplin cargo trousers with an elasticated drawstring waist, front pockets, flap back pockets and a leg pocket. Legs with a tab and press-stud.

KIDS EXCLUSIVE. Set with a shirt and pair of shorts in airy linen. Shirt with a collar, buttons down the front, open chest pocket and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Shorts with an elasticated waist and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.

Jacket in imitation leather with quilted sections, a small stand-up collar with an adjustable tab with press-studs and a zip down the front. Zipped chest pockets, pockets in the side seams and an inner pocket with a press-stud, adjustable tabs with press-studs at the sides and press-studs at the cuffs. Lined.
Thong briefs in cotton jersey with a low waist, lined gusset, narrow sides and string back.

Single-breasted jacket in a linen weave with narrow notch lapels, a decorative buttonhole, a chest pocket, flap front pockets and two inner pockets. Two buttons at the front, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined. Slim Fit that tapers at the chest and waist which, combined with slightly narrower sleeves, creates a fitted silhouette.
Jumper in soft, rib-knit cashmere with a hole pattern, small stand-up collar and long sleeves.
T-shirt in jersey with a motif.
Lace push-up bras with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and a narrow fastening at the back with two pairs of hooks and eyes.
Ankle-length joggers in soft sweatshirt fabric with a high, elasticated, drawstring waist, patch pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Shopper in braided paper straw with imitation leather details. Two handles at the top, a wide tab with a magnetic fastener and a zipped inner compartment. Lined. Size 15.5x32x35.5 cm.
Short, imitation suede skirt with a concealed zip in the side and a laser-cut, hole-patterned, scalloped hem. Lined.
Short, sleeveless dress in glittery jersey with a deep V-neck and elasticated spaghetti shoulder straps that cross at the back.
Dress with a marled jersey bodice, short sleeves, a print motif on the front, a gathered seam at the waist with a small frill trim and a printed, lined tulle skirt.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with print motifs and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Off-the-shoulder top in an airy cotton weave with elastication and a wide flounce with broderie anglaise at the top, and a seam below the bust. Unlined.
Swim shorts in woven fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets and short legs with slits in the sides. Soft mesh inner shorts.
Calf-length dress in a viscose weave with a V-neck, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a high slit in one side. Unlined.
Satin sandals with square toes, a toe loop and lacing at the front with long straps that tie around the leg. Imitation leather linings and insoles and rubber soles. Covered heels 8 cm.

prod_name: CA Hugh Linen shirt TVP R
detail_desc: Shirt in washed linen with a cutaway collar, French front, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slim Fit – a fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Long-sleeved top in soft, striped organic cotton jersey with press-studs on one shoulder (no press-studs in sizes 18M-4Y).
Hat in braided paper straw hat with a band and pompom trim around the brim. Width of brim approx. 3.5 cm.
Short, straight-cut dress in an airy viscose weave with a round neckline and concealed button placket. Detachable tie belt at the waist and long, batwing sleeves with a button at the cuffs.
Sleeveless sports top in jersey. Mesh-lined hood with a drawstring and collar, and a rounded hem.
Fitted, long-sleeved body in soft cotton jersey with a slightly wider neckline, low-cut back and press-studs at the crotch.
Soft toy in velour. Removable dress with shimmering wings at the back. Polyester filling. Height approx. 17 cm.
Lace bikini briefs with a low waist, lined gusset and cutaway coverage at the back.

Straight-cut, knee-length coat in soft faux shearling with a stand-up collar, zip down the front, handwarmer pockets and diagonal front pockets. Gently dropped shoulders and long sleeves with inner ribbing at the cuffs. Slightly longer at the back. Lined.
T-shirt in printed cotton jersey.

Set with two pre-tied bow ties in a jacquard weave – one in a child’s size and one in an adult’s size. The child’s bow tie has an adjustable elastic strap with a plastic fastener at the back. Width 10 cm and 11.5 cm.
Straight-style T-shirt in cotton jersey with a print motif on the front.
Swimming trunks with an elasticated drawstring waist and lined front.
Short dress in a crêpe weave with a concealed zip at the back, 3/4-length sleeves with inset, hemstitched trims at the cuffs, a seam at the waist and gently flared skirt. Unlined.
Ankle-length trousers in woven fabric with a regular waist, zip fly and button and low crotch. Side pockets, a fake welt back pocket and gently tapered legs with creases.

Leggings in washed superstretch, flexible denim for maximum mobility with hard-worn details with patches on the inside. Elasticated waist, fake front pockets, real back pockets and raw-edge, cut-off hems.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft cotton knit with an intarsia-knit motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline.

Soft, non-wired bra top in ribbed jersey with lace sections. Wide shoulder straps, jersey-lined cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support, and covered elastication at the hem. No fasteners.
Short-sleeved shirt in a soft cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front, a small embroidery detail on the chest, and a rounded hem.
Glittery Alice band with an appliqué in the shape of a crown with beads at the top and spotted tulle fabric underneath. Lined with grosgrain fabric.
Warm-lined suede boots with a zip at the back. Faux fur linings and insoles and trainer soles. Heel 3.5 cm.
Bikini briefs in mesh with decorative sparkly stones, a low waist, lined gusset, narrow sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
Trousers in woven fabric made from recycled polyester with a high waist, concealed hook-and-eye fastener, zip fly and wide, straight legs with creases.

Blouse in a crêpe weave with a small stand-up collar and V-neck with a concealed button at the top. Yoke with a pleat at the back, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Fully-fashioned hi-top trainers with an imitation leather heel cap, ribbed shaft and a grosgrain loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles made from recycled polyester. Patterned soles.
Swim shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist and fake fly. Soft mesh inner shorts.
Fitted, V-neck top in a rib knit containing glittery threads with narrow shoulder straps.
Jersey T-shirt in a cotton blend with a burnout pattern.
Top in soft linen and viscose jersey with short cap sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey with a ribbed neckline.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front and a round, rib-trimmed neckline.
Shorts in cotton twill. High, frill-trimmed paper bag waist with elastication, and a zip fly with buttons. Side pockets and wide legs with sewn-in turn-ups.
Jumper in a fine-knit wool blend in a relaxed fit with dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
3/4-length leggings in ribbed jersey with wide elastication at the waist.
Long-sleeved blouse in woven fabric with frill details, a small stand-up collar and buttons down the front. Long sleeves and buttoned cuffs with narrow frill trims.
Pyjamas with a jersey T-shirt top and woven shorts. T-shirt with a print motif on the front. Shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist and fake fly.
Cardigan in a soft, fine knit with slits in the sides and no buttons.

Straight-cut, knee-length dress in woven fabric with a small, gathered collar and V-shaped opening at the top. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, a narrow detachable belt at the waist, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.
Joggers in stretch supersoft denim with a ribbed elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, front and back pockets and elasticated hems.
Espadrilles in cotton with a braided jute trim around the soles and concealed elastic at the back of the heels. Fabric linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Wide, V-neck jumper in a soft, fine knit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Sports trousers in softly draping jersey with grosgrain side stripes. Elasticated, drawstring waist, welt side pockets and cuffed hems. Muscle Fit – a fit designed to showcase the body’s physique. Slightly shorter legs that are slim-fitting at the thighs and knees and taper at the hems for a flattering silhouette.
Short, sleeveless lace dress with a V-neck, adjustable spaghetti straps that cross and tie at the back, a cut-out section at the back and a seam at the waist. Lined.
Jumper knitted in a soft wool blend with decorations. Low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Joggers in soft sweatshirt fabric with a print motif, a ribbed, elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, sewn-in creases down the legs and ribbed hems.
Short skirt in washed cotton denim with a high waist, zip fly and button, front and back pockets and a raw-edge hem.
Knee-length coat in soft faux fur with notch lapels, hook-and-eye fasteners at the front, and side pockets. Lined.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend.
Weekend bag in woven fabric with a two-way zip and two handles at the top, and a zipped inner compartment. Lined. Size 13x35x42 cm.
Nursing jumper in a soft, fine-knit containing some wool with slits and ties at the sides for easy nursing access, 3/4-length sleeves with a lace trim, and a lace-trimmed hem.
Sports shorts in fast-drying, breathable functional fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and zipped side pockets. Unlined.

Set with a T-shirt in cotton jersey and pair of shorts in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. Printed T-shirt with a round neckline and rounded hem. Shorts with elasticated ribbing and a drawstring at the waist, text print and rounded hems.
Swimsuit with wide shoulder straps, a low-cut back, laser-cut scalloped edges and lined gusset.
Satin mules with pointed toes. Satin linings and insoles and rubber soles. Covered heels 6 cm.
